mapper.select: select a.thumb_path as tempPic,d.thumb_path as forgeryPic,c.id,c.country,c.remark,b.issuing_body,e.country as prov from zx_template_albums a left join zx_driving_license_template b on a.template_id=b.id left join zx_country_category c on b.country_id=c.id left join zx_forgery_proof_albums d on a.template_id=d.template_id left join zx_country_category e on e.id=b.issuing_body order by a.id;
